title: SOLO SINGING - ONE VOICE MAGIC
description: Music is felt rather than heard. With your beguiling voice, you can touch people's hearts and enlighten their souls. After all, music is much more than just a tune.
registration: This event comes under general registration.
rules: This event has four consecutive rounds: Round 1 (Prelims), Round 2 (Finals)
Usage of metronomes (Device used by musicians that marks time at a particular rate by producing a regular beat) is not permitted.
The song to be performed can be of any language.
This event consists of two rounds - Prelims and Finals.
The maximum time for performance is 2 minutes.
Instrumental accompaniments are not allowed for this round.
The maximum time for performance is 3 minutes.
